Title: Fresh Needle Scent
Description:
Say, if you really are here to help, I could use me some needles off them sprites in Pranksters' Hollow.

The grummles don't believe in luck they can't smell. They'll pay better for yaks that have that fresh needle scent.
CompletionText: Mmm. Nothing like the fresh scent of needle.
RewardText: You just earned me a handsome bonus. Getting those needles is a pain in the paw but worth it when we take our yaks to market. Here, for your troubles.
